articles.description: New figures show 4,000 hours of PE have been lost from the curriculum in state schools in England.
articles.title: Cuts to PE hours should be immediate national concern, say charity

articles.description: Gary Neville says Manchester United's handling of the Mason Greenwood investigation has been "pretty horrible" and lacked strong leadership.
articles.title: Neville criticises Man Utd's handling of Greenwood investigation

articles.description: Arsenal beat Crystal Palace at Selhurst Park thanks to a penalty from captain Martin Odegaard.
articles.title: Odegaard penalty gives Arsenal win at Crystal Palace

articles.description: Famous former players, a famous former manager, but Naples' second club are focused on more important priorities.
articles.title: A Maradona, a mission and Naples' second club

articles.description: Which players impressed our football pundit Garth Crooks enough to make his second Team of the Week this season?
articles.title: Who is a 'shining light'? - Garth Crooks' Team of the Week

articles.description: Britain's Dina Asher-Smith misses out on a world 100m medal as American Sha'Carri Richardson claims her first major title against a star-studded field in Budapest.
articles.title: Richardson wins 100m gold with Asher-Smith eighth

articles.description: Luis Rubiales is criticised by a Spanish government minister for kissing forward Jenni Hermoso on the lips after Spain's Women's World Cup victory.
articles.title: Spanish FA president criticised for Hermoso kiss

articles.description: Watch USA's Sha'Carri Richardson win her first 100m world title, beating Jamaica's Shericka Jackson and Shelley-Ann Fraser-Pryce, with Dina Asher-Smith finishing eighth.
articles.title: Richardson wins women's 100m world title

articles.description: Mason Greenwood will leave Manchester United following an internal investigation after police dropped charges of attempted rape and assault.
articles.title: Greenwood to leave Man Utd after abuse allegations

articles.description: It was not the ending she deserved but Mary Earps rightly celebrated her Golden Glove award after the Women's World Cup final defeat by Spain.
articles.title: How Earps confirmed her status as world's best goalkeeper
